mapper.insert: INSERT INTO state( state_id, state_name, country_id, created_by, created_at, updated_by, updated_at, record_status) VALUES(#{stateId},#{stateName},#{countryId},#{createdBy},#{createdAt},#{updatedBy}, #{updatedAt},'A')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM state WHERE state_id = #{stateId} AND record_status = 'A'
mapper.update: UPDATE state SET state_name=#{stateName}, country_id=#{countryId},updated_by=#{updatedBy}, updated_at=#{updatedAt} WHERE state_id=#{stateId} AND record_status = 'A'
